00037 #define EBUILDER(_name) char *_name[] = {\
00038 "[.]",\
00039 "Number of Fragment = INT : 0",\
00040 "User build = BOOL : n",\
00041 "User Field = STRING : [64] 100",\
00042 "Fragment Required = BOOL[2] :",\
00043 "[0] 0",\
00044 "[0] 0",\
00045 "",\
00046 NULL }

00049 typedef struct {
00050    WORD event_id;
00051    WORD trigger_mask;
00052    INT  nfragment;
00053    char buffer[32];
00054    char format[32];
00055    BOOL user_build;
00056    char user_field[64];
00057    char hostname[64];
00058    BOOL *preqfrag;
00059    BOOL *received;
00060 } EBUILDER_SETTINGS;
00061 
00062 typedef struct {
00063    double events_sent;
00064    double events_per_sec_;
00065    double kbytes_per_sec_;
00066 } EBUILDER_STATISTICS;
00067 
00068 typedef struct {
00069    char buffer[32];
00070    char format[32];
00071    WORD event_id;
